description:
Save money on (international) calls & texting/SMS. Use calling cards, call-through providers, SIP and SMS over Internet.

May require a (your regular) calling card, an account, Linphone, an SMSi account.

Features:
- Support for cheap calls and a client for inexpensive texting SMS over Internet.
- On the fly number adjustment for SIP, international calls and texting SMS.
- Use of Regular Pre Contacts. 
- SIP support, requires Linphone 0.2+ 
- Group texting through Pre groups.

- SMS Smart Keys with fill-in-the-blanks fields and true 1-tap quick send.
- Preset providers: Voipbuster, SMS77, Innosend. Without any endorsement!
- Support for your provider of choice, SMS texting must use ‘HTML get’.
- Guided input wizard for fill-in & setup.

- Flexible character translations setup.
- Adjustable edit-message font size.
- Support to select WiFi and/or 2/3G.
- Long text message tailoring (>160).
- SMS to email archiving.

- Option to use Pre dialer or messaging.
- Patch for on the fly adjustment of phone numbers when using the Pre dialer.

- Version 2 has many new features. See  www.itura.nl/revhistory.html 
- Free lite version available. POLICY CHANGE: the lite version is now fully functional. Only SMSi blocked after 1 month.
- SMSi works on Touchpad, the phone part is perhaps useful for SIP only.
